verses.name: Revelation 1:1
verses.text: The Revelation of Jesus Christ, which God gave unto him, to shew unto his servants things which must shortly come to pass; and he sent and signified it by his angel unto his servant John:

verses.name: Revelation 1:2
verses.text: Who bare record of the word of God, and of the testimony of Jesus Christ, and of all things that he saw.

verses.name: Revelation 1:3
verses.text: Blessed is he that readeth, and they that hear the words of this prophecy, and keep those things which are written therein: for the time is at hand.
